title: Moto G52 leak suggests that it will be a minor upgrade over the Moto G51
content:
Although it’s only been a few months since Motorola launched the Moto G51, leaks about its successor have already started popping up online. According to the latest leak, the upcoming Moto G52 will feature the same design as the Moto G51, but it will feature a few improvements on the inside. The leak in question

The post Moto G52 leak suggests that it will be a minor upgrade over the Moto G51 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A new leak about the upcoming Moto G52 reveals that it will be a minor upgrade over the Moto G51 from last year. Read on to learn more.
